tier_rules.foundation: Read, name, or identify something shown directly
tier_rules.application: Apply one simple rule to a new example. NO multi-step.
tier_rules.stretch: Harder version of same task â€” draw instead of read, order instead of name. Still NO explanation or error detection.

1.context_must_be: Familiar: food, animals, toys, family, classroom objects, home
1.context_forbidden: Train schedules, financial transactions, multi-day planning, abstract scenarios

tier_rules.foundation: Recall or recognise directly from memory
tier_rules.application: Apply one rule to a simple word problem. One step only.
tier_rules.stretch: Two-step problem OR one simple observation sentence max

2.context_must_be: School, home, local market, sports playground

tier_rules.foundation: Recall and apply a single rule
tier_rules.application: Two-step word problem or duration calculation
tier_rules.stretch: Error detection OR explain a mistake in one sentence OR multi-step problem

3.context_must_be: School, local transport, sports, simple market problems
3.context_forbidden: Abstract algebra, international settings, technical jargon

tier_rules.stretch: Analysis, explanation, conversion, or pattern finding

4.context_must_be: Real-world: transport, planning, measurement, simple finance

tier_rules.stretch: Synthesis, estimation, pattern generalisation, multi-concept problems

5.context_must_be: Rich real-world: travel, science, data analysis, environment
